column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2021
column14: This product has more in common with industrial paint than it does with lipstick. Do not buy.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2020
Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2021
column14: These colors are great. It stays on for an extended period of time. It makes my lips VERY dry though and after about an hour, it starts cracking and pilling up on my lips. It looks like dead skin, but it’s not. The smell is terrible. Smells like chemicals. You can’t taste it though. Overall, this product is a no for me.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2022
column14: The colors don't appear as rich as in the picture. The beige nude tones are too light, and look chalky. There is a strong rose scent as well...that you can taste. They do dry down quickly, but my lips looked a bit wrinkled. Overall long lasting, but my lips did absorb the formula in spots.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2021
column14: I did not like these. They look so pretty in picture. When I put them on the colors did not look good on me.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2021
column14: i loved the colors and it feels good on my lips, not dry and stiff like other matte

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2020
column14: They smell like watermelon, I really like how well they apply and they stay on for a while. Not as lasting as I thought but for the price, they're worth it. I got rid of like 4 because the shades were not good looking on my complexion but other than that, I really liked them.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2021
column14: The ingredient list does not include "parfume" or any fragrance, yet these are heavily fragranced. Not just a little, but super smelly. And a really, really floral scent that isn't pleasant. If you have super sensitive skin like me, you can't do fragrance. Please notate these have fragrance in them, that's important.
